alertDescription.value: disk usage by filesystem at root

query.value: InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_gauge('node_filesystem_free_bytes') | extend device = tostring(Labels.device) | extend hostname = tostring(Labels.hostName) | extend mountpoint = tostring(Labels.mountpoint) | extend FreeBytes = Val | join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_gauge('node_filesystem_size_bytes') | extend device = tostring(Labels.device) | extend hostname = tostring(Labels.hostName) | extend mountpoint = tostring(Labels.mountpoint) | extend SizeBytes = Val) on AgentId, Computer, Origin, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, TimeGenerated, hostname, device, mountpoint | extend PctFree = (FreeBytes / SizeBytes) * 100 | extend PctUsed = 100 - PctFree | project AgentId, Computer, Origin, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, TimeGenerated, hostname, device, mountpoint, FreeBytes, SizeBytes, PctFree, PctUsed
